ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_01_10:
Ahahaha! I’ve been waiting for you!
Glad you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s deepen our bonds even more today!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_02_10: I was just talking about you with her.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_03_10:
Oh, she went home...
I guess she thought to give us some space.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_01_10:
I talked to a lot of people on Mt. Pyre, so I got
used to all of them coming and going.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_02_10:
I’m guessing she was just shy, so don’t worry
about it!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_01_10:
Admittedly, I have a bit of a
“Grandma’s girl” streak.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_03_10:
Whenever I’m feeling down, she tells me a joke
to make me laugh.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_04_10:
So when I was a member of the Elite Four and
the Pokémon League, I couldn’t see my grandma.
That made me sad.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_01_10:
Grandma tells me that the most important thing
is the bond between you and your Pokémon.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_02_10: That’s why my Pokémon and I cherish our bonds!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s a Pokémon called Sableye in the
Hoenn region!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_02_10:
It has jewels for eyes, which sparkle, and it’s
really cute!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_03_10:
It’s a bit of a prankster, so it might be a
handful, but be nice if you ever see one.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_01_10:
A lot of people might not notice them, but
there are Pokémon in a lot more places than
you would expect!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_03_10:
Wait a minute... There aren’t any wild Pokémon
on Pasio...
ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve been with Dusclops for a long time now.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_02_10:
Grandma brought her home when I was little
and feeling down.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_03_10:
She’s been my best friend, and she’s stayed at
my side ever since!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0702_01_10:
To have a friend at your side when 
you’re going through hard times is 
the most precious thing in the world.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_02_10:
Wouldn’t you say our bonds have gotten
really strong?
ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_03_10: I hope I can introduce you to my grandma soon.
ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_04_10: I’m sure she would be really happy to meet you!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_01_10:
My grandma’s Pokémon sometimes come to check
in on me!
ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_02_10: They usually stay near the foot of Mt. Pyre.
ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_01_10: Perfect timing! I have a present for you!
ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_02_10: A nearby Pokémon told me that it was there.
ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0702_01_10:
It was right here until a little while ago.
I guess it’s shy.
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_01_10:
You want to know what kind of training I did on
Mt. Pyre?
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_02_10:
I battled and befriended Ghost-type Pokémon to
understand them better.
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_03_10:
I took Grandma’s advice to become friends with
them more...
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_04_10:
And then, by the time I realized it, I had become
stronger, too! Isn’t the power of bonds amazing?
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_01_10:
Ghost-type Pokémon and I have an
unspoken understanding.
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_02_10:
Because they stay by my side when I’m happy,
sad, in good times, and in bad!
ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_03_10: That’s why I hope I can stay with them forever!
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_01_10:
How many other Trainers or Pokémon did you
deepen bonds with since you came to Pasio?
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_02_10:
I was hoping that I would be able to become
stronger here.
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_04_10:
So that’s why I’m really happy that I can talk
to you like this! Ahahaha!
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_01_10:
Talking is great, isn’t it? It lets you
communicate your feelings to others!
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if you don’t speak the same language, even
if you can’t see each other...
ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_03_10:
As long as you want to share something and are
willing to listen, you can be friends with anyone!
ch0049_00_fuyo/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Are your ears burning?
I was just talking about you!
ch0049_00_fuyo/3002_0701_01_10: Haha! It’s so nice and quiet this morning, isn’t it?
ch0049_00_fuyo/3003_0701_01_10:
The afternoon sunshine tells me our friendship
is gonna grow even stronger today!
ch0049_00_fuyo/3004_0701_01_10:
Already afternoon, huh?
Wish I could have tea with my grandma.
ch0049_00_fuyo/3005_0701_01_10:
Haha! What great timing!
There’s been a lot of buzz about you lately!
ch0049_00_fuyo/3006_0701_01_10:
It’s always so lively and fun here at night!
But I cherish our quiet conversations, too.
